docs.overview:
# Checkbox

A control that allows the user to toggle between checked and not checked.
docs.api: # API ## [z-checkbox] Directive > z-checkbox is a Directive that brings you a customizable checkbox with minimal configuration To get a customized checkbox, just pass the following props to the directive. | Property | Description | Type | Default | | ----------- | ----------------------- | ----------------------------- | --------- | | `zType` | checkbox type | `default \| destructive` | `default` | | `zSize` | checkbox size | `default \| lg ` | `default` | | `zShape` | checkbox shape | `default \| circle \| square` | `default` | | `zDisabled` | checkbox disabled state | `boolean` | `false` |
